title: A merry dialogue between Band, Cuff, and Ruff done by an excellent wit, and lately acted in a shew in the famous Vniversity of Cambridge.
author: Excellent wit.
notes: The third edition, the 1st appearing in 1615. A second edition, 1615, appeared under title: Exchange ware at second hand, viz. Band, Ruffe, and Cuffe. It contained an introductory dialogue not found in the other editions. cf. Camb. hist. of Eng. lit., vol. VI, p. 537.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
